item.hint_l1: One who holds a commission in the armed forces.
item.feedback_l1: This is an example of a nominal sentence (no verb). الضابط means the officer and مخلص means loyal. Together they mean: The officer is loyal.

item.hint_l1: One who is engaged in a branch of engineering.
item.feedback_l1: The first word مُهندِس means engineer and the second مَدَنيّ civil. Note that the indefinite article a does not exist in Arabic.

item.hint_l1: One who serves in an army.
item.feedback_l1: The first word الجندي means the soldier and شجاع means courageous. This sentence does not include a verb.
The first word الطبيب means the doctor and the second word ماهر means skillful. Notice the first word has the definite article ال but not the second.

item.hint_l1: A person whose occupation is teaching others.
item.feedback_l1: المدرس is the teacher and ممتاز means excellent. In this example, two nouns form a nominal sentence in which the first is the subject.

item.hint_l1: A person following a course of study.
item.feedback_l1: The first word الطالب means the student and the second مجتهد is diligent.

item.hint_l1: One whose profession is to give legal advice.
item.feedback_l1: The first word محام means a lawyer and the second مشهور means famous.
This is not a nominal sentence. The first word is the subject and the second the adjective.

item.hint_l1: A public official who decides cases brought before a court of law.
item.feedback_l1: The first word قاض means a judge and the second word عادل means fair.

item.hint_l1: One who operates a motor vehicle.
item.feedback_l1: The first word السائق means the driver and the second محترف is professional.

item.hint_l1: One that sells foodstuffs and various household supplies.
item.feedback_l1: The first word عمّي means my uncle (father's side) and the second بقال means a grocer.

item.hint_l1: A person who works for another in return for financial compensation.
item.feedback_l1: This is a nominal sentence. The first word الموظف is defined with ال and the second is indefinite.

item.hint_l1: A person who keeps records and takes minutes of meetings.
item.feedback_l1: Notice that both words agree in number and gender. جميلة (beautiful) is a singular feminine adjective.

item.hint_l1: A man who is a member of a police force.
item.feedback_l1: A nominal sentence, the first word أخي means my brother (definite). The second word شرطي is indefinite.

item.hint_l1: A person who trained to care for the sick.
item.feedback_l1: The first word أختي means my sister.
